data.text: @thehill Bumped into George on the street one day while on vacation in Mexico many years ago. He was VP at the time. Hey, you're vacationing here as well. How about that? He was with Mexico's president and they passed me on the street. En Dolores, Hidalgo. #BasedOnATrueStory #ElGrito

@thehill I hope H's pain,suffering are minimal and dc soon so he can be surrounded by his loved ones. H chose NOLA for '88 RNC convention to give econ boost to the city that care forgot (sisters of charity old nickname for NOLA).
